data.question: What is the highest SO2 adsorption capacity achieved by SIFSIX-1-Cu at atmospheric pressure?
Which material exhibits the highest SO2/CO2 selectivity according to the text?
Is the SO2 adsorption capacity of SIFSIX-2-Cu-i at 0.01 bar higher than that of Zn-MOF-74?
What is the role of Sδ+···Fδ− and Oδ−···Hδ+ interactions in the adsorption process?
data.answer: They enable the specific recognition of SO2 molecules through grasping every atom of the adsorbed SO2.

data.question: Does SIFSIX-3-Zn have a smaller pore size compared to SIFSIX-1-Cu?
What is the SO2 uptake of SIFSIX-2-Cu-i at 0.002 bar?
Can SIFSIX materials be fully regenerated after SO2 adsorption?
What is the significance of the pore size in the adsorption of SO2?
data.answer: A moderate pore size is crucial to afford adequate strength of synergistic host-guest and guest-guest interactions for a dense packing of SO2.

data.question: Did the breakthrough experiments confirm the SO2/N2 and SO2/CO2 selectivity of SIFSIX materials?
What is the SO2 uptake of SIFSIX-3-Ni at 1.01 bar?
Is the SO2 adsorption capacity of SIFSIX-1-Cu higher than that of MFM-202a under the same conditions?
What is the effect of moisture on the adsorption capacity of SO2 on SIFSIX-2-Cu-i?
data.answer: Moisture has slightly effect on the adsorption capacity of SO2 on SIFSIX-2-Cu-i.

data.question: What is the SO2/N2 selectivity range for SIFSIX-1-Cu?
Does the SIFSIX-2-Cu-i material show better performance in SO2 adsorption at low pressures compared to high pressures?
What is the role of the pore chemistry in the adsorption of SO2?
data.answer: The pore chemistry is crucial for the selective recognition and dense packing of SO2 clusters through multiple synergistic host-guest and guest-guest interactions.

data.question: Is the SO2 adsorption capacity of SIFSIX-3-Zn at 0.002 bar higher than that of SIFSIX-1-Cu?
What is the SO2/CO2 selectivity range for SIFSIX-2-Cu-i?
Can the SIFSIX materials be used for gas desulfurization applications?
What is the significance of the guest-guest interactions in the adsorption process?
data.answer: The guest-guest interactions enforce the adsorption through promoting the primary binding and enabling secondary adsorption to form SO2 clusters.
